column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The deep dish pizzas take about 30-45min to create
column2: so definitely come to Lou Malnati's if you have enough time for a longer lunch/dinner. Also
column3: this place gets PACKED during peak hours. I recommend coming a bit earlier
column5: since you will have to wait for the pizza to cook anyway
column6: and you can try to beat the lunch/dinner rush.
